Articles.Content:
Well after watching a marathon of the wonderful classic scifi series Babylon 5 I decided to try and make a starfury here in KSP. this was an amazingly fun ship to build, but man is it difficult to get into space ... especially with my lack of skills lol. Below i've uploaded a video of the ship (both in VAB and in space) as well as a craft file if any of you want to check this out for yourself.

Carft File: click to download from the spaceport

Hope you all enjoy it, and I would love any feedback/suggestion on the ship. And if any of you download the craft and perhaps make an improvement yourself I'd love to see. Thanks
